transcript: if you had to create a human and you wanted them to be tough what would you put them through I mean it probably wouldn't be a CH life if you wanted someone who's going to come out the other side with patience and you probably wouldn't give them things immediately if you wanted someone to come out hard on one side they probably wouldn't go through a soft life or everything was given to them if you wanted someone to have grit then you probably have to have them fail over and over and over again before they would succeed it's like we want these character traits but we're not willing to pay the price associated with getting them
